post.author: Admin
post.title: Market Day - September 6, 2014
post.description: Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, September 6, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.marketday.com. Pic
post.content:
Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, September 6, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.marketday.com.
Pick up is Thursday, September 11, 2014 from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm. Please note the time change for pick up!

Spend at least $50 this month and you will receive a free set of melamine mixing bowls.

Also, if you have never ordered from Market Day before, and you place an on-line order of $50 or more, you can save $5 by entering the promo code FALLFIVE during check out. Any questions, please contact Sue Galuska at suegaluska@yahoo.com or 440-582-4120.

Thanks,
 Sue Galuska
